name: Magical Witch Bell and Her Non-Magical Friends
summary: A magical witch named Bell lives in a small non-magical town, where she spends her days fixing trinkets and creating gadgets. She's the only magic user here, but for some reason, magical mishaps have been happening all over town...
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Visual Novel
  • 游戏引擎: Ren'Py
  • 发行日期: 2017-10-18
  • 官方网站: https://npckc.itch.io/magicalwitchbell
  • 开发: npckc
